data.title: Famous Birthdays on May 21
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 21st of May. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on May 21.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 247

Aurelia Cotta

Mother of Julius Caesar, born in Rome

Albrecht Dürer, German Renaissance painter and printmaker (Adam and Eve), born in Nuremberg, Germany (d. 1528)

Philip II of Spain

King of Spain (1556-98) and Portugal (1580-98), born in Valladolid, Spain

Joseph de La Barre, French composer, born in Paris, France (d. 1678)

Eleonora Maria Josefa of Austria, queen consort of Poland and Lithuania (d. 1697)

Azzolino Bernardino Della Ciaia, Italian organist and composer, born in Siena, Grand Duchy of Tuscany (d. 1755)

Frederich Karl Erbach, German composer, born in Erbach im Odenwald, Electoral Palatinate, Holy Roman Empire (d. 1731)

Alexander Pope

English poet (The Rape of the Lock, translation of Homer), born in London

Wilhelm Gottfried Enderle, German composer and violinist, born in Bayreuth, Electorate of Bavaria (d. 1790)

Alfred Moore, American judge (d. 1810)

Joseph Fouché, French statesman (d. 1820)
